dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3896519O] FurNation, hosted site.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 28, 2007 7:34 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3896519O] FurNation, hosted site.

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. FurNation, hosted site.
Added by system at Saturday, Apr 28 2007 06:16 pm 
X-MailFrom: sean@inkjammer.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat Apr 28 18:15:58 2007

Message-ID: <4633D59B.2000000@inkjammer.com> 
Date: Sun, 29 Apr 2007 05:15:39 +0600 
From: "Sean @ Inkjammer.com" <sean@inkjammer.com> 
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.10 (Windows/20070221) 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
To: abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: FurNation, hosted site. 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
Received-SPF: error (temporary) (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: encountered
temporary error during SPF processing of domain of inkjammer.com)
client-ip=208.97.132.81; envelope-from=sean@inkjammer.com;
helo=randymail-a9.g.dreamhost.com; 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Apr 2007 23:15:58.0494 (UTC)
FILETIME=[2DF8ABE0:01C789EB] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
It has come to our attention that FurNation (www.furnation.com, owned by

James A. Robertson ), a service and site hosted by your company, has  
reposted 27,300+ images from thousands of artists without consulting the

original creators of the images and copyright holders. These images were

re-posted from an online Newsgroup which had nothing to do with the  
FurNation site and was done so without our knowledge. 
 
As you know, redistribution of copyrighted material without prior  
consent of the copyright holder is illegal, and I take protest to this  
site reposting my artwork and the artwork of other artists I represent  
from another site (www.furaffinity.net). 
 
This is unauthorized redistribution on a grand scale and equates to  
visual piracy. 
 
Sean Piche
